tool.name: SAGA.table_tools.22
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False output_data_COPY $output_data_COPY name SAGA.table_tools.22 TABLE $TABLE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_COPY $OutputSection_COPY.outputType_COPY transmissionMode_COPY $OutputSection_COPY.transmissionMode_COPY

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Table
param.help: Table The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_COPY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_COPY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Creates a copy of a table.
